name: K. Dermitzakis (dermitza)
body:
# about

My name is Konstantinos Dermitzakis and I was born in the town of [Agios Nikolaos, Crete](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agios_Nikolaos,_Crete) on March 16th 1984. I have lived in [Edinburgh, Scotland](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edinburgh) from September 2001 to 2006. There, I finished my undergraduate studies and obtained a BSc with Honours in [Computer Science](http://www.ed.ac.uk/schools-departments/informatics/) from the [University of Edinburgh](University of Edinburgh). I also completed my MSc studies in [Artificial Intelligence](http://www.ed.ac.uk/schools-departments/informatics/) at the same university. I have been a research associate at the [Artificial Intelligence Lab](http://www.ifi.uzh.ch/ailab.html) at the [University of Zurich](http://www.uzh.ch/) since 2007, where I also obtained my PhD degree. My resume is available as a PDF document (481kb) [here](Dermitzakis_03.2014.pdf).


# projects

A list of open source projects I have developed. These include code, mechanical and electronic hardware. Some of them were designed and developed during my stay at the AI Lab, UZH.

* [microPower](https://dermitza.github.io/microPower/), a miniature, multi-output power supply
* [bigMama](https://dermitza.github.io/bigMama/), a constant current breakout board
* [roboShieldMega](https://dermitza.github.io/roboShieldMega/), an arduino mega robot shield
* [demoPuppy](https://dermitza.github.io/demoPuppy/), a miniature robot puppy
* [SecureNIO](https://github.com/dermitza/SecureNIO/), a minimal, non-blocking, Java NIO TCP framework supporting SSL/TLS

# contact

* [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/dermitza)
